name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: The standard beef burger with melted cheese and the usual fresh toppings.

name: Bacon Burger
description: Classic burger enhanced with crispy bacon for extra smoky flavor.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Rich and creamy, with mushrooms and Swiss cheese bringing depth.

name: BBQ Burger
description: Sweet and smoky BBQ sauce with crunchy onion rings.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Meatless burger using beans, lentils or vegetables for the patty.

name: Chicken Burger
description: Grilled or fried chicken breast in burger form — lighter than beef.

name: Turkey Burger
description: Turkey meat gives a leaner option; often paired with lighter or fruity toppings.

name: Lamb Burger
description: Lamb adds a richer, more aromatic flavor — often using Mediterranean-style toppings.

name: Fish Burger
description: A fish fillet or fish patty — light and often served with tartar or citrus.

name: Juicy Lucy
description: Cheese is stuffed inside the beef patty, creating a molten core when you bite in.

name: Butter Burger
description: Topped or cooked with butter — very rich, usually associated with Wisconsin style.

name: Angus Burger
description: Made with Angus beef — often a premium option on menus.

name: Onion Burger
description: Onions are pressed into the patty while cooking, giving a sweet‐onion flavor throughout.

name: Green Chile Cheeseburger
description: Roasted chiles give a spicy kick, commonly seen in New Mexico style.

name: Steamed Cheeseburger
description: Instead of grilling, burger and cheese are steamed for a moist, tender result.

name: Rice Burger
description: Uses compressed rice patties instead of traditional bread buns. Popular in East Asia.

name: Chori Burger
description: Filipino style burger using chorizo‐flavored patty and local condiments.

name: Smash Burger
description: Patty is smashed down on a hot griddle, producing crispy edges.

name: Islak Burger
description: Turkish street burger, bun and patty soaked in tomato sauce.

name: Ramly Burger
description: Malaysian street favorite; patty wrapped in egg, with slaw and sauces.

name: Reindeer Burger
description: Arctic‐region meat with sweet berry accompaniment.

name: Hamburguesas Mexicanas
description: Mexican‐style burger with local flavors and spicy toppings.

name: Bun Kebab
description: Pakistani street food; bread roll filled with spiced patty, egg, chutney etc.

name: Vada Pav Burger
description: Indian snack‐turned burger: spiced potato dumpling (vada) inside bun (pav), often with chutneys.

name: Donkey Burger
description: Chinese speciality: shredded donkey meat served on flat bread.

name: Pastrami Burger
description: Beef burger topped with pastrami for extra cured meat flavor.

name: Patty Melt
toppings: served on rye or grilled bread
description: Cross between burger and grilled cheese / sandwich; served on grilled bread instead of bun.

name: Fat Boy Burger
description: Loaded burger with chili sauce and pickles; hearty and full of toppings.
